inclusion.criterion: Provision of signed and dated informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stated willingness to comply with all study procedures & availability for study duration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known allergic reactions eculizumab or meningococcal vaccine
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids for atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
